intro: Share one body with CONERU, the dimension-hopping girl, and fight as one! A brand-new sensation: a “Two Hearts, One Body” 2D Platforming Action Date!
description:
A date you’ll never forget—

Your battle android alter-ego, Socrates, suddenly finds their body being shared by a dimensional girl named Coneru of the Subspace!?

Run, jump, punch, kick, laugh, cry, and occasionally get sidetracked—
It’s a cheerful adventure shared by two souls, as they blast away mysterious aliens invading the peaceful Shinjuku City.
This is a 2D action-packed “date” like no other!

Team up with weapons and beams!
You strike with close-range weapons while Coneru blasts enemies with her “Coneru Beam” from afar!
You pick the weapons, but her beams? Totally based on her mood!
She might even come up with new beams mid-date!?
But hey, going along with her whims—that’s what a real date’s all about!
Sync your moves and unleash tag-team combos to knock enemies into the stars!

Get ready for her overdrive—“Runrun Mode”!
When the right conditions are met and Coneru gets in an exceptionally good mood, she goes into Runrun Mode—
An explosive, rule-breaking surge of speed and power!
Can you keep up with her when she’s at full throttle!?

Endless chatter in “Coneru Talk”!
During the date, Coneru reacts to everything with nonstop chatter and lively voice lines!
After all, this is an action date!
Why fight with a scary face when you can wipe out enemies with a smile and some fun conversation?

Two souls from separate dimensions, finally overlapping through this game.
Embark on a once-in-a-lifetime 2D action date, and create unforgettable memories—just the two of you!
